result.execSummary:
All charges against Davion Turner in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Davion Turner is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Davion Turner

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Davion Turner not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Davion Turner.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica Ann Behling in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant Davion Turner not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Davion Turner.  Attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant's motion to modify bail denied.
Final pretrial proceeded.  State's offer stated on the record.  Defense rejects State's offer.  Case remains in jury trial posture.  Case is adjourned to 10-17-22 at 8:30 am for Jury Trial.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Davion Turner not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status Conference. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court received defendant's PRO SE SPEEDY TRIAL request.  Expires 11/10/2022.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Speedy Trial.  (Davion Turner, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Davion Turner, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Davion Turner not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE ON DACAST.  Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests another status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 10.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616.  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Davion Turner not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Molgren was just appointed to the case and needs discovery and an offer.  Case is adjourned to 7-18-22 at 8:30 am for status conference, by zoom.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
  Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with ALW (10/16/92)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Davion Turner in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Davion Turner in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Davion Turner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
